title.narrative: Botswana - Morupule B Generation and Transmission Project

description.narrative: The PDOs are to support Botswana in: (i) developing reliable and affordable supply of electricity for energy security; (ii) promoting alternative energy resources for low-carbon growth; and (iii) building its institutional capacity in the energy sector.

condition.narrative: Appoint Project Coordinator within 3 months of effectiveness
Complete long term tariff policy study
Connect only southern compartment of new Paje well field and use NSC as main source of water
Execute coal supply agreement with MCL
Implement agreed remediation measures for ensuring air quality standards due to Morupule A and B
Proceed with interim tariff adjustment no later than 3 months from effectiveness
Route ash from Morupule A to new ash dam

title.narrative: Generation Capacity of Conventional Generation constructed under the project

comment.narrative: CSI Retrofit per SEGES August 2013; this is also a key indicator under the project's design
Generation Capacity added under the project (gross)
Operating Capacity (gross) taken over by BPC
A proposal under consideration by the Cabinet for submittal to Parliament

title.narrative: GOB Decision on a regulatory agency

comment.narrative: Documents prepared for seeking Cabinet's submission to parliamentary for approval of the Bill.
